## FieldErrors type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FieldErrors<T extends FieldValues = FieldValues> = Partial<FieldValues extends IsAny<FieldValues> ? any : FieldErrorsImpl<DeepRequired<T>>> & {
    root?: Record<string, GlobalError> & GlobalError;
};
```
